text: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 is a 2017 science fiction superhero movie directed by James Gunn and a sequel to the 2014 movie Guardians of the Galaxy. ==Cast== *Chris Pratt as Peter Quill / Star-Lord *Zoe Saldana as Gamora *Dave Bautista as Drax *Vin Diesel as the voice of Groot *Bradley Cooper as the voice of Rocket Raccoon *Karen Gillan as Nebula *Kurt Russell as Ego the Living Planet *Michael Rooker as Yondu *Sean Gunn as Kraglin *Sylvester Stallone *Ving Rhames *Miley Cyrus *David Hasselhoff as himself Category:2017 action movies Category:2017 science fiction movies Category:2017 comedy movies Category:2010s action comedy movies Category:2010s sequel movies Category:2010s superhero movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:Marvel Cinematic Universe movies Category:Movies about raccoons Category:Movies composed by Tyler Bates Category:Movies directed by James Gunn Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Movies set in the 2010s Category:Movies with screenplays by James Gunn Category:Superhero comedy movies Category:American superhero movies Category:Movies set in Missouri
title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
